mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ORICREINFSGMT (ORIGCREDITORINFSGMTSEQNO, INITCREDNAME, INITCREDORGNM, ORIGDBTCATE, INITRPYSTS, REPORTFLAG) values (#{OrigCreditorInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InitCredName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InitCredOrgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OrigDbtCate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InitRpySts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_ORICREINFSGMT set INITCREDNAME = #{InitCredName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INITCREDORGNM = #{InitCredOrgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGDBTCATE = #{OrigDbtCate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INITRPYSTS = #{InitRpySts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORIGCREDITORINFSGMTSEQNO = #{OrigCreditorInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ORIGCREDITORINFSGMTSEQNO, INITCREDNAME, INITCREDORGNM, ORIGDBTCATE, INITRPYSTS, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_ORICREINFSGMT where ORIGCREDITORINFSGMTSEQNO = #{OrigCreditorInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ORIGCREDITORINFSGMTSEQNO, INITCREDNAME, INITCREDORGNM, ORIGDBTCATE, INITRPYSTS, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_ORICREINFSGMT
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ORICREINFSGMTM (ORIGCREDITORINFSGMTSEQNO, INITCREDNAME, INITCREDORGNM, ORIGDBTCATE, INITRPYSTS, REPORTFLAG,ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS) select ORIGCREDITORINFSGMTSEQNO, INITCREDNAME, INITCREDORGNM, ORIGDBTCATE, INITRPYSTS, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_ORICREINFSGMT where ORIGCREDITORINFSGMTSEQNO = #{OrigCreditorInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
